title: DDFP 500: Week 7 recap, Arians vs. Fisher & 500th episode spectacular!
itunes:title: DDFP 500: Week 7 recap, Arians vs. Fisher & 500th episode spectacular!
description:
Shek is joined by Handsome Hank and Ike Taylor to discuss the most fun teams to watch in the AFC & NFC, the struggles of the AFC North and Hank's experience with Odell Beckham Jr. in London. Also, the fellas discuss the varied reactions from Coach Fisher and Coach Arians to their players' poor Week 7 performances and determine the best coaching philosophy. Then, the guys break down the best wins and worst losses from Week 7, highlighting the Lions' win and the Vikings' loss. Plus, in honor of our 500th episode, Shek welcomes in a surprise guest to reflect on some of the best moments from the DDFP.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
